summary: I HAVE 2010 TOYOTA TUNDRA THAT HAS HAD A SUDDEN ACCELERATION.  I WAS DRIVING DOWN THE HIGHWAY WITH THE CRUISE SET AT AROUND 73MPH.  I HAD TO HIT THE BRAKE, WHEN I HIT THE CRUISE TO REINSTATE THE CRUISE THE TRUCK SEAMED LIKE IT WENT FULL TROUBLE.  MY FOOT WAS NEVER ON THE GAS AND THE TRUCK ACCELERATED TO OVER 90 BEFORE I CANCELED THE CURSE CONTROL.  THIS HAS HAPPENED ONLY ONCE. *TR
